Merge pull request #294 from nullivex/master

Add the License type and upgrade repository entry.

Add the License type and upgrade repository entry.

The main reason for the repository change is so the github link will show up properly on npmjs.org I know the previous value is legal but it doesnt seem to work right with npmjs.org.

I added the `license` value based on the LICENSE file because the newer versions of NPM are getting more strict on enforcing the license entry and complaining about it during installs.

Merge pull request #280 from litchie/master

Support self signed ca certification
documentation fix

Support self signed ca certification

Previously when the couchdb server uses a self signed certification,
the connection will abort with verify leaf signature error.
Now we can provide the root ca file as an option when creating cradle Connection.

Merge remote branch 'cloudhead/master'

* cloudhead/master:
  use our own mixin() code, as process.mixin is deprecated
  remove Args code
  extracted argument handling, moved to vendor/vargs
  run tests by default, on make
  tests: catch some errors sooner
  return 'this', from addCallback
  refactor the event-emitter code, use addCallback for simplicity, and because node is complaining now
  new vows.js
more with the attachment support
basic PUT support, assuming we have all the attachment data present
get tests working
Fixing the Cradle connection (no-cache) list of databases test that breaks now since we don't delete all databases on setup.

Let's not blindly delete ALL local databases without warning. Just the ones we create.
Some people may have data locally. :)
